Corridor - Clipboard Sync Client
================================

Version: 1.0.0
Size: 48.09 MB
Type: Self-contained executable (no .NET required)

INSTALLATION:
1. Download Corridor.exe
2. Run Corridor.exe
3. Follow the setup wizard

USAGE:
- Normal mode: Run Corridor.exe (shows setup window)
- Silent mode: Run Corridor.exe --silent (background only)
